name: Leaper Keeper
description:
Now the BeeKeeper leaps like a cricket!

The library is flooded. Get to higher ground. Had more ideas with this one, still, I am happy I managed to submit!

A submission for the GDKO round  5: recreating the old Leaper game. 

Tried to go for a Metroidvania style, where each bee gives a unique ability to the player allowing them to move around the map.

Game made with Godot and Asesprite and here is my twitter if you wish to stay connected, come say hi: https://twitter.com/spoonsweet1 and Youtube as well!

https://www.youtube.com/c/spoonsweet

Awesome music by: Hart find him: https://soundcloud.com/user-682766289

and here: https://www.youtube.com/user/HartkorcraftPOWRACA/videos

https://hartkorcraft.bandcamp.com/

PLUS I would like to thank Aurora!

https://soundcloud.com/ggauroras https://twitter.com/gg_auroras
